      • SetContent

        public void SetContent(PageContent content,
                       float x,
                       float y,
                       float w,
                       float h)
        set content of form, need a box defined in form.
        the box define edge of form area, which PageContent object includes.
        Parameters:
        content - PageContent object.
        x - x of form's box
        y - y of form's box
        w - width of form's box
        h - height of form's box

      • SetTransparency

        public void SetTransparency(boolean isolate,
                            boolean knockout)
        set this form as transparency.
        Parameters:
        isolate - set to isolate, mostly are false.
        knockout - set to knockout, mostly are false.
